questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 15 â€“ EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS FOR ALL GUARANTEES: 'Illnesses that are the expression or direct consequence of pathological situations existing prior to the conclusion of the policy' are excluded. The worsening of an existing pathology falls under this exclusion unless it resulted in hospitalization (which was not reported).
